onboarding_flow.content: Welcome to your autopilot for daily decisions. We'll learn your preferences and automate routine choices.
onboarding_flow.goal: Set expectation that app reduces decisions rather than adds complexity

onboarding_flow.content: Connect your calendar to automate morning routines around your schedule
onboarding_flow.goal: Enable schedule-aware automation while maintaining guest-first approach

onboarding_flow.content: How do you prefer to start your day? Are you a morning person? Prefer structured or flexible routines?
onboarding_flow.goal: Minimal initial preference gathering to start automation immediately

onboarding_flow.content: Here's your first automated morning routine - it will get better as we learn
onboarding_flow.goal: Show immediate value and set expectation of improvement over time

core_usage_flow.content: Your personalized morning routine based on today's schedule and weather
Quick decision capture with simple category buttons
Rate today's automated decisions and adjust preferences
Tomorrow's planned automation based on your feedback

primary_navigation.rationale: Tab navigation provides constant access to key functions while maintaining simplicity - critical for reducing cognitive load

content_hierarchy.organization_principle: Present-to-future temporal flow with immediate actions prioritized over configuration

home_screen.layout: Single scrollable feed with large automation cards and minimal chrome
home_screen.accessibility_notes: 44pt touch targets, high contrast cards, VoiceOver labels for all automation elements

core_feature_screens.purpose: Display current day's automated decisions and routines
core_feature_screens.layout: Vertical card stack with large, readable automation suggestions
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Dynamic Type support up to 200%, semantic colors for status, clear headings structure

core_feature_screens.purpose: Effortless capture of decisions made for AI learning
core_feature_screens.layout: Large button grid with category-based decision types
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Minimum 48dp touch targets, voice control alternatives, haptic feedback confirmation

core_feature_screens.purpose: Quick feedback loop to improve automation quality
core_feature_screens.layout: Progressive disclosure wizard with simple rating system
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Screen reader compatible ratings, alternative to gesture-based input, clear progress indication

core_feature_screens.purpose: Show decision patterns and automation improvement
core_feature_screens.layout: Simple data visualization with decision fatigue trends
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Alt text for charts, sonified data representation, table alternatives to visual graphs

primary_actions.interaction: Single tap to approve, long press for options, swipe for alternatives
primary_actions.feedback: Immediate visual confirmation, subtle haptics, voice feedback for accessibility

visual_design_direction.brand_personality: Calm, intelligent, trustworthy - like a helpful personal assistant that gets smarter over time

color_strategy.primary: #4A90E2 (calm blue) with 4.8:1 contrast ratio on white backgrounds

typography.primary_font: SF Pro (iOS) / Roboto (Android) - system fonts for familiarity and accessibility
typography.scale_factor: Dynamic Type scaling from 17pt to 34pt minimum, supports 200% scaling
typography.readability_notes: High contrast headings, generous line spacing, short line lengths for comprehension

screen_reader_support: VoiceOver (iOS) - semantic labels for all automation elements
TalkBack (Android) - logical reading order for decision flows
Live regions for automation updates and feedback
motor_accessibility: Voice control alternatives for all gestures
Switch control compatibility with clear focus indicators
visual_accessibility: 4.5:1 contrast ratios for normal text, 3:1 for large text
Motion reduction support for users with vestibular disorders
Alternative text for all meaningful images and automation visualizations
cognitive_accessibility: Progressive disclosure to prevent information overload
Clear feedback for all actions and automation states
Familiar interaction patterns from platform standards
